src:
Man of the Match AS Roma vs Napoli: Nicolo Zaniolo
03 Nov 2019, 00:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Nicolo Zaniolo tampil impresif saat AS Roma menaklukkan Napoli. Gol pembuka yang dicetaknya dari ujung kotak penalti berperan besar membawa Giallorossi mengamankan tiga poin.
AS Roma menang 2-1 menjamu Napoli di Stadio Olimpico pada pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019).
Nicolo Zaniolo membuka kunggulan Roma di menit 19. Jordan Veretout kemudian menggandakannya lewat ekseskusi penalti di menit 55. Napoli hanya bisa menipiskan selisih skor melalui gol Arkadiusz Milik di menit 72.
Selama tiga musim terakhir sebelum ini, Roma selalu tersungkur setiap kali meladeni Napoli di kandang. Giallorossi bertekad memutus tren negatif itu, dan berhasil melakukannya. Zaniolo turut berjasa untuk kemenangan timnya.
Scroll terus ke bawah.
text:
Man of the Match AS Roma vs. Napoli: Nicolo Zaniolo
Nov 3 2019, 00:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Nicolo Zaniolo appeared impressive when AS Roma conquered Napoli. The opening goal he scored from the edge of the penalty box played a big role in bringing the Giallorossi to secure three points.
AS Roma won 2-1 at home to Napoli at the Stadio Olimpico in Week 11 of Serie A 2019/20 on Saturday (02/11/2019).
Nicolo Zaniolo opened Rome's lead in the 19th minute. Jordan Veretout then doubled it through penalty execution in the 55th minute. Napoli could only dilute the difference in score through Arkadiusz's goal in 72 minutes.
During the last three seasons before this, Roma always fell every time serving Napoli at home. Giallorossi determined to break the negative trend, and managed to do it. Zaniolo also contributed to the victory of his team.
Scroll down.
